tool.name: SPRING min-Z
tool.command: mkdir -p targets && #for target in $targets link '${str(target)}' 'targets/${target.element_identifier}' && echo '${target.element_identifier}' >> 'target_list' && #end for #if str($input_type.input_type_selector) == "true": mkdir -p inputs && #for input in $input_type.inputs link '${str(input)}' 'inputs/${input.element_identifier}' && echo '${input.element_identifier}' >> 'input_list' && #end for python3 '$__tool_directory__/spring_minz.py' -tl target_list -tp targets -il input_list -ip inputs -m '$minscore' -c '$crossreference' -x '$idx' -o '$output' -l '$log' #else python3 '$__tool_directory__/spring_minz.py' -tl target_list -tp targets -m '$minscore' -c '$crossreference' -x '$idx' -o '$output' -l '$log' #end if

param.name: targets
param.label: Target profiles
param.help: Homology search result of target/query profiles `hhr`.

param.name: inputs
param.label: Input profiles
param.help: Homology search results of input profiles `hhr`.

param.name: crossreference
param.label: Cross reference
param.help: Cross reference of interacting proteins `first_id metadata_id second_id`.

param.name: minscore
param.label: Score threshold
param.help: Matching interaction pairs with a score lower than this threshold will be excluded.

param.name: idx
param.label: Identifier length
param.help: Specify the length of the identifier e.g. `1ACB_A` has length 6.

tool.help: This tool creates 3D models from HH-search/HH-blits homology results utilized by SPRING.
